column1: obituary for: angela l. (mitchell) stott | cooper funeral home| angela l. (mitchell) stott
column6: 2015 in norman. she was born on may 20
column7: 1972 to larry and rita mae (spencer) mitchell in shawnee
column8: oklahoma. angela was a lifelong resident of the shawnee/tecumseh area. she attended shawnee high school and graduated with the class of 1991. she later attended rose state college in midwest city. angela was currently employed with falcon cable now known as vybe cable as a programmer. she also worked for oklahoma indian legal services. angela enjoyed going to the casino
column10: reading and spending time with her nieces and nephews. she was a people person and enjoyed bring people together. she was preceded in death by her father
column12: don vizenor. angela is survived by her mother
column15: phillip stott and heidi nation of tecumseh
column17: dennis and sharron vizenor of washington; 2 aunts
column18: loretta murphy and janet mitchell; nieces
column21: ashton and annabell stott; nephew; dustin stott; great-nieces
column23: niceolo and gabby stott; and other extended family and friends. visitation will begin 9:00 a. m.
column26: 2015 and continue through service time. family gathering will be from 6:00 p. m. to 8:00 p. m.
column29: 2015 at cooper funeral home. service will be 2:00 p. m.
column32: 2015 at cooper funeral home chapel with houston tiger and richard wolf officiating. burial will follow at tecumseh cemetery under the direction of cooper funeral home of tecumseh.
